mapper.insert: insert into underoneyear(jan, feb, mar, apr, may, jun, jul, aug, sep, oct, nov, deb) values(#{jan, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{feb, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mar, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{apr, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{may, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jun, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jul, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aug, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sep, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oct, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nov, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deb, jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into dailyworklist values(99, #{empno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{selectedDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{night, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekend, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualAllowance, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
